nodes.text: A Taste of Takodana was a meal for younglings available at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. It included a bean spread, nuts, vegetables, and a beverage.

The meal was served out of the mobile restaurant Tuggs' Grub which was operated by Artiodac chef Strono Tuggs. Prior to becoming a visiting chef on Batuu, Tuggs worked in Maz Kanata's castle on Takodana until its destruction during the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY. His reputation in the Outer Rim had led to many beings wanting what Tuggs called "a taste of Takodana" in his cookbook. He operated Tuggs' Grub out of a modified transport, and wrote of it, "It's given me a chance to share not just a taste of Takodana but an entire galaxy of flavors." "A Taste of Takodana" became the slogan of Tuggs' Grub.

A Taste of Takodana is found in the real world at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description reads, "Black bean hummus, edible soil with nuts, chilled dipping vegetables, multigrain crisps served with choice of small lowfat milk or small DASANI® water." Since its introduction, it has been renamed to Takodana Veggie Dippers.
